name: HealthLiteracyGoals
title: Health Literacy Goals
description: There are currently no existing domain specific LOINC codes for Health Literacy. That value set will be added to this group once it is available.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: <insert metadata> The value sets in this group represent the goals associated with Health Literacy as identified by the Gravity Project),(Data Element Scope: Supports the Gravity SDOH Clinical Care FHIR Implementation Guide for the exchange of goal.description),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes SNOMED CT goals that have been identified through the Gravity Project community consensus voting process),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)

contains.display: Has access to understandable information for health-related decisions (finding)
